alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 7:26PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Southern Cass, Crow Wing and Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, Big Sandy Lake and, East Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass
